attributes.action: make the police arrest people who attempt to do identity theft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment if someone has used your identity to try and obtain goods in your name the police won't do anything about it if the criminal havent got away with anything, which I think is wrong. If they have attempted it, it should be classed as a crime

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
